sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './sign.css'; const Sign = () => { const [username,setUsername]=useState('') const [pasward,setpassward]=useState('') function handleChange(){ const obj={username,pasward}; const dataStored=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('newUser'))||[] const data=[{...obj,dataStored}] localStorage.setItem('newUser',JSON.stringify(data)) } return (
@ setUsername(e.target.value)} required />
setpassward(e.target.value)} required />
); } export default Sign;
